II. Physical examination
Th is activity will be nearly the same during all the visits. Th e initial readings may be taken 
as a baseline with which the later readings are to be compared.
A. General examination
Pallor
Th e presence of pallor indicates anaemia. Th e woman should be examined for pallor at each
